name: Mellow
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 Submission, character design, art, animations, first level, and lighting done by me, everything else done by a team of 3 programmers and 2 other artists.

If you wanna find out more take a look at https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/mellow

Controls:

Movement: arrow keys/WASD

Action: Ctrl
